config.sql: WITH COM AS( SELECT SCODE FROM DW_DIMCOMPANY WHERE (SCODE = :company OR SPCODE LIKE :company||'%') AND CISDEL='N' AND CISLEAF = '1') SELECT NID,SK, BALANCE, ONEYEAR, TWOYEAR,THREEYEAR, FOURYEAR, SKXZ,(CASE WHEN SFNB='1' THEN '是' ELSE '否' END) AS SFNB, (CASE WHEN SFZC='1' THEN '是' ELSE '否' END) AS SFZC,FZCFLTEXT AS FZCFL,ZWRZKTEXT AS ZWRZK, KHSJE, DNKHSJE,YQZK, SZXSSJE FROM (SELECT NID,B.SNAME AS SK, FACT_BALANCE AS BALANCE, FACT_A AS ONEYEAR, FACT_B AS TWOYEAR, FACT_C AS THREEYEAR, FACT_D AS FOURYEAR, C.SNAME AS SKXZ,ISINSIDE AS SFNB,ISNORMAL AS SFZC,D.SCODE FZCFL,D.SNAME AS FZCFLTEXT,E.SCODE AS ZWRZK, E.SNAME AS ZWRZKTEXT, FACT_E AS KHSJE, FACT_F AS DNKHSJE, FACT_G AS YQZK, FACT_H AS SZXSSJE FROM (SELECT NID,DIM_CUSUPPLIER,DIM_COMPANY,DIM_ITEM,FACT_BALANCE,FACT_A,FACT_B,FACT_C,FACT_D,ISNATURE, ISINSIDE,ISNORMAL,SCONTENTA,SCONTENTB,FACT_E,FACT_F,FACT_G,FACT_H FROM DW_FACTAGEANALYSIS WHERE DIM_COMPANY IN (SELECT SCODE FROM COM) AND DIM_PERIOD=:period AND DIM_ITEM='1001') A INNER JOIN (SELECT SCODE,SNAME FROM DW_DIMCUSTOMER WHERE SCOMCODE IN ('1001','100101')) B ON A.DIM_CUSUPPLIER=B.SCODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT SCODE,SNAME FROM DW_DIMDROPMENU WHERE SPCODE='10') C ON A.ISNATURE=C.SCODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT SCODE,SNAME FROM DW_DIMDROPMENU WHERE SPCODE='11') D ON A.SCONTENTA=D.SCODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT SCODE,SNAME FROM DW_DIMDROPMENU WHERE SPCODE='12') E ON A.SCONTENTB=E.SCODE )
